title: sold:  T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb SGC 40 (VG 3)

posts.post_title: sold:  T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb SGC 40 (VG 3)
posts.post_content:
$7250 .  

Card is sold.  actual sale price not necessarily same as asking.

T3 Cobb graded VG 3 by SGC.  No creases or wrinkles through the central image.  See high res scans for closeups of the corner wear, etc.

As seen in the scans, the front does have what appears to be 2 small tape marks at the top and bottom of the card, but there is no paper loss in these areas.  This is likely what knocked it down to a "3". 

If you click on the imgur links you can see high resolution scans (300 dpi). Thanks!
